abstract.t: This document specifies multipath extension for the QUIC protocol to enable the simultaneous usage of multiple paths for a single connection. The extension is compliant with the single-path QUIC design. The design principle is to support multipath by adding limited extension to [QUIC-TRANSPORT]. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/yfmascgy/Multipath-QUIC-IETF-Draft.
